news.title: Israel-Iran strikes likely just the opening salvo as region and markets brace for what comes next
news.summary: Israel's overnight missile barrage was the largest attack on the Islamic Republic since the Iran-Iraq war of the 1980s. Israel launched the missile barrage in response to Iran's missile tests.

news.title: Air India crash: What to know about the first fatal Boeing Dreamliner tragedy
news.summary: An Air India jet flying from Ahmedabad to London crashed shortly after takeoff into a fireball with 242 people aboard. The crash killed all 242 people on board.

news.title: Scale AI's Alexandr Wang confirms departure for Meta as part of $14.3 billion deal
news.summary: Meta is investing $14.3 billion into Scale AI, landing the startup's CEO Alexandr Wang to help the company's artificial intelligence efforts.

news.title: These investments are now your best defense after Israel launches attack on Iran
